description: This file defines the NoteCodec utility class for encoding and decoding Note objects to and from JSON strings, facilitating JSON serialization/deserialization for Note instances and lists.

classes.name: NoteCodec
classes.description: Utility class providing static methods for JSON encoding and decoding of Note objects and lists.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts a Note object to a JSON string.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Creates a Note object from a JSON string.

methods.name: listToJson
methods.description: Converts a list of Note objects to a JSON string.

methods.name: listFromJson
methods.description: Creates a list of Note objects from a JSON string.
